titleStmt.title: London looke backe at that yeare of yeares 1625 and looke forvvard, vpon this yeare 1630 / written not to terrifie, but to comfort.
titleStmt.author: Dekker, Thomas, ca. 1572-1632.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by A.M. and are to bee sold by Ed. Blackmoore at the Angell in Paules Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Thomas Dekker--Cf. STC (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: cropped and faded, with loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Guildhall Library (London, England).
